about_the_game:
Old school 2D platforming...with a twist.

It's another zombie game....except this time YOU are the zombie...and instead of trying to stay alive....you're trying to stay dead! Jump, flip, throw, and avoid health powerups as you try to (not) save your neck.

Features include:
  • Precision 2D platforming
  • Over a half dozen types of jumps (including many hidden ones)
  • Pick up and throw enemies and objects
  • Interact with foreground and background enemies and objects
  • Get a unique suit with specific powers on each world
  • Countless sidekicks that will help you stay dead
  • Many types of headgear to help boost your stats
  • Several "power-downs" that will keep your health low (at the expense of mobility)
  • The ability to ride and drive many animals and vehicles

content_descriptors.notes: There are visual depictions of extreme comedic violence against the main character...but in his case, these are actually GOOD.  For example, at the end of each level, he will get smashed, blown up, run over, etc. in order to return his health to 0 and get ready for the next level.
